sentence.Network_en: And can it be that good policy does not equally enjoin it?
sentence.Network_cn: 而良好的政策不也是一样要求这种行为 吗 ?

sentence.Network_en: Religion and morality enjoin this conduct.
sentence.Network_cn: 宗教和道德要求这种行为.

sentence.Network_en: " One thing, thou that wast my wife, I would enjoin upon thee, " continued the scholar.
sentence.Network_cn: “ 既然你曾经是我的妻子, 我要求你必须做到一点, ” 那学者继续说.

list.abs: Religion and morality enjoin this conduct ., 宗教和道德要求这种行为.
and I hereby enjoin upon the people so declared to be free abstain from all violence , unless in necessary self-defence ;我现在命令这些被宣布自由的人们，除非是必须的自卫，不得有违法行为；

above all , I enjoin the government and the people to uphold the racial laws theand to resist mercilessly the poisoner of all nations , international Jewry .最重要的是，我命令政府和人民要维护种族法律到底，无情地抗击一切民族的毒害者——国际犹太人。
Our boss enjoined us to obey the rules ., 我们老板要我们遵守规则.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (formerly also as injoin): from Old French enjoindre, from Latin injungere 'join, attach, impose', from in- 'in, towards' + jungere 'to join'

entry.def: If you enjoin someone to do something, you order them to do it. If you enjoin an action or attitude, you order people to do it or have it.

example.ex: She enjoined me strictly not to tell anyone else...
example.tran: 她严令我不准告诉其他任何人。

example.ex: It is true that Islam enjoins tolerance; there's no doubt about that...
example.tran: 事实上伊斯兰教告诫人要宽容，这一点毫无疑问。

entry.def: If a judge enjoins someone from doing something, they order them not to do it. If a judge enjoins an action, they order people not to do it.

example.ex: The judge enjoined Varityper from using the ad in any way.
example.tran: 法官禁止Varityper公司以任何方式使用这则广告。
严禁那种做法的初步禁令

means.word_mean: 2. give instructions to or direct somebody to do something with authority;

sentences.sentence: "I said to him to go home"
"She ordered him to do the shopping"
"The mother told the child to get dressed"

auth_sentence.content: Mastro assured Kaplan, You have the right to enjoin litigation here and overseas.
auth_sentence.res_content: Mastro assured Kaplan, You have the right to enjoin litigation here and overseas.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Mastro assured Kaplan, You have the right to enjoin litigation here and overseas.

stems_affixes.word_buile: adjoin[v.邻接, 毗连]+ing……的→adj.邻接的, 隔壁的
disjoin[v.[使]分开, [使]分离]+t+ed表形容词→分开的
join结合,连接+t→n.接合处,接头;关节adj.联合的,共同的,连接的
join结合,连接+t→n.接合处,接头;关节adj.联合的,共同的,连接的
re反+join结合,连接+der→反过来接→回答
ad再+join结合,连接→再连上→毗连
dis分开+join结合,连接→连接分开
en进入+join结合,连接→进入连接→命令加入

stems_affixes.value_cn: 参加,加入;联合,连接;和……在一起
stems_affixes.word_buile: join结合,连接→v.参加,加入;联合,连接;和……在一起
sub在下面+join结合,连接→在下面接上→增补

sentences.en: The embezzler was severely punished and enjoined to kick back a portion of the stolen money each month.
sentences.cn: 贪污犯受到了严厉惩罚,并被责令每月退还部分赃款。
